With attachment 62215, if I tried to create a dynamic Web project choosing the Axis2 facet without first installing the Axis2 runtime location using the preference, I got the message:

Failed while installing Axis2 Web Services Core 1.1.

The Axis2 facet install should present the user with a configuration page to enter the Axis2 runtime location (best to reuse the Axis2 runtime preference page).  After they enter the Axis2 runtime location in the Axis2 facet install configuration page, it would be use for the current project and also stored in the Axis2 runtime preference.  This is similar to when creating dynamic Web project, if the runtime has not been created, the user is directed to the preference page to install the server runtime.  From that point on, the installed server runtime would be used.
I retried with 04/26 WTP 2.0 driver, with no Axis2 runtime installed, I'm not getting any error if I select to add Axis2 facet.
If we are not able to show the Install Axis2 runtime page right to adding Axis2 facet, at least we should have an error message telling the user what to do.
